synopsis.text:
Toyota teams up with Studio 4Â°C to present PES: Peace Eco Smile, a captivating web anime series that follows the journey of PES, an extraterrestrial visitor, and NaSuBi, an enigmatic entity captivated by Earth's allure. Set in the vibrant Kichijoji, Tokyo, the two explore the city and its surroundings, accompanied by the eco-friendly Prius Liftback and Prius C hatchback. As they delve deeper into the human world, PES and NaSuBi discover the essence of love, kindness, and the joy found in life's simple pleasures.

PES's life takes a turn when he rescues Kurumi from a near-fall into a pond at Iinokashira Park, sparking an immediate connection between the two. To be closer to Kurumi, PES takes up a part-time job at a local flower shop, marking the beginning of his Earthly escapades.

The anime features a cast of automobiles, including the Lexus LFA and Toyota Camry hybrid, as the story unfolds in a series of three to four-minute episodes available on Toyota's dedicated website. Join PES and NaSuBi on their heartwarming adventure and witness the world through their curious eyes, as they uncover the true beauty of humanity and the importance of eco-conscious living.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
